title: Analysis of f from graph of f' part - d

content.question: Given that f(1) = 3, write an expression for f(x) that involves an integral. Find f(4) and f(–2).

frqParts.text: Given that f(1) = 3, write an expression for f(x) that involves an integral. Find f(4) and f(–2).

topic.text: 6.5: Interpreting the Behavior of Accumulation Functions Involving Area

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
